name: Discord
shortDescription: Link wallets to Discord and automate role assignments based on holdings.
longDescription: The Discord module connects your community's Discord server to on-chain data. Members link their wallets to their Discord identity, and role rules automatically assign or revoke Discord roles based on token holdings, NFT ownership, or other on-chain criteria.
keyInfo: Automated role assignment based on holdings
Configurable role rules per collection or token
Periodic sync to keep roles up to date
